Uses of Interface
com.madrobot.di.xml.io.HierarchicalStreamDriver

  • Packages that use HierarchicalStreamDriver 
    Package Description
    com.madrobot.di.xml
    Everything you will ever need with XML Serialization
    com.madrobot.di.xml.io
    Highly flexible I/O wrappers that can be used for any text based or binary protocols.

    • Uses of HierarchicalStreamDriver in com.madrobot.di.xml

      Constructors in com.madrobot.di.xml with parameters of type HierarchicalStreamDriver 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLWizard(HierarchicalStreamDriver hierarchicalStreamDriver)
      Constructs an XMLWizard with a special HierarchicalStreamDriver.
      XMLWizard(ReflectionProvider reflectionProvider, HierarchicalStreamDriver hierarchicalStreamDriver)
      Constructs an XMLWizard with a special HierarchicalStreamDriver and ReflectionProvider.
      XMLWizard(ReflectionProvider reflectionProvider, HierarchicalStreamDriver driver, ClassLoader classLoader)
      Constructs an XMLWizard with a special HierarchicalStreamDriver and ReflectionProvider and additionally with a prepared ClassLoader to use.
      XMLWizard(ReflectionProvider reflectionProvider, HierarchicalStreamDriver driver, ClassLoader classLoader, Mapper mapper)
      Constructs an XMLWizard with a special HierarchicalStreamDriver and ReflectionProvider and additionally with a prepared Mapper and the ClassLoader in use.
      XMLWizard(ReflectionProvider reflectionProvider, HierarchicalStreamDriver driver, ClassLoader classLoader, Mapper mapper, ConverterLookup converterLookup, ConverterRegistry converterRegistry)
      Constructs an XMLWizard with a special HierarchicalStreamDriver, ReflectionProvider, a prepared Mapper and the ClassLoader in use and an own ConverterRegistry.
      XMLWizard(ReflectionProvider reflectionProvider, Mapper mapper, HierarchicalStreamDriver driver)
      Deprecated. 
      As of 1.3, use XMLWizard.XMLWizard(ReflectionProvider, HierarchicalStreamDriver, ClassLoader, Mapper) instead

    • Uses of HierarchicalStreamDriver in com.madrobot.di.xml.io

      Classes in com.madrobot.di.xml.io that implement HierarchicalStreamDriver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDriver
      Abstract base class for all HierarchicalStreamDriver implementations.
      class  AbstractXppDriver
      An abstract base class for a driver using an XPP implementation.
      class  XppDriver
      A HierarchicalStreamDriver using the XmlPullParserFactory to locate an XML Pull Parser.
